content:
The chunk represents a comprehensive compatibility matrix for various collision solids within a 3D collision system, detailing which solids can function as "from" or "into" objects during collision detection.

In the table below, the solid is listed without its "Collision" preface, e.g., "Sphere" instead of "CollisionSphere", to save on space.

From \ Into FloorMesh InvSphere Plane Polygon Sphere Capsule Box Line Yes Yes Yes Yes Yes 1.10 Parabola Yes Yes Yes Yes Ray Yes* Yes Yes Yes Yes Yes Yes Segment Yes Yes Yes Yes Yes Yes Sphere Yes Yes Yes Yes Yes Yes Yes Capsule 1.10.2 1.10 1.10.13 1.10 1.10 1.10 Box 1.10.2 1.10 1.10 Yes 1.10
